summary: "Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street" is a 2007 musical thriller film directed by Tim Burton. It's about a vengeful barber, Sweeney Todd (Johnny Depp), who kills customers and turns their bodies into pies with help from Mrs. Lovett (Helena Bonham Carter). The story is set in Victorian London and is based on a stage musical by Stephen Sondheim. Burton had wanted to make this film for decades. It was well-received by critics and made over $153 million.
title: Sweeney Todd The Demon Barber of Fleet Street (2007 film)
